title: Mission Planner for UAV Battery Replacement
authors: Zden\v{e}k Bou\v{c}ek, Miroslav Fl\'idr, Ond\v{r}ej Straka
abstract:
The paper presents a mission planner for an autonomous unmanned aerial
vehicle (UAV) battery management system. The objective of the system is to plan
replacements of the UAV's battery on the static battery management stations.
The plan ensures that UAVs have sufficient energy to fulfill their long-term
mission, which would otherwise be impossible.
  The paper provides a detailed description of the mission planner and all of
its components. The functionality of the planner is successfully demonstrated
in simulated multi-UAV multi-station scenarios.
